iati-activity.title: Local Cooperation Fund (LCF) in Serbia
iati-activity.description: The project "Support to children with special needs in the process of inclusion" foresees a new approach to preparing the environment for the process of inclusion of children with special needs. By implementing and publishing a specially prepared picture book for children and parents, an educational workshop will be realized for parents and children and for kindergarten teachers (executives of all pre-school institutions in Belgrade). Throughout all these project activities key events will be registered in the form of a video recording, which will be used in editing the documentary treating the subject of inclusion of disabled persons in the society of Serbia. The film will be screened at the final panel discussion devoted to the topic the project deals with, which is planned on the Universal Childrenâ€™s Day on November 20, 2010. The documentary will also be provided for broadcasting.
